title: RTCP Tolerance Fix + Thread Stripping Wiring

findings.title: RTCP is_within_tolerance hardcoded to true

findings.title: Thread stripping strength calculation exists in engine but not wired to any tool
findings.fix: Added calculate_thread_stripping tool definition + handler in threadTools.ts

Tool marked SAFETY CRITICAL in description
